title: LoL Client Crash - May 22nd [FIXED]
body:
Hi Everyone,

As you may be aware there is currently an issue with the OCE LoL client crashing. We are working on a resolution but heavily suspect that the crash occurs only after you enter the in-client store.
The crash tends to occur sometime after entering the store or if you leave and then re-enter the store. This means that you may experience a client crash when you queue up for a game or even after entering champion select, as long as you accessed the store sometime prior.

~~To avoid the issue, if you intend to play a game please refrain from using the store beforehand, or make any intended purchases and re-log in to the client before queuing up for a game.~~

We know this issue really sucks and we're thankful for your patience on this one.

**EDIT:** This has been fixed, we found a misconfiguration and have been testing extensively with no crashes. Please let us know if you continue to see issues.
